title: Skin Code
body: Hey guys so i got a code for skin but on the new 2016 league client i cant seem to find the field for codes can u help me if there is another way

replies.body: You will find it in purchase RP part and then when u see stuff about credit cards and paypal, scroll down and you will see prepaid cards & codes. :)

If you head to the store and hit the +RP button in the top right, you can then select "Prepaid Cards and Codes" and enter the code in there. Below is a screenshot if you need a visual.


(Click to Enlarge)



http://imgur.com/a/5TaIJ





Let me know if you have any questions!
